categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Operation Sunder Zero was a two-part military operation carried out by the Republic Navy during the Cold War. The Coruscant Aegis squadron and the Republic Navy broke a Mandalorian blockade of the Hydian Way, and destroyed the Rancor's Claw squadron in battle in the Drexel system.
